content: As with all Drinks, the potency of the Loong Balm can be increased by finding the Awoken Wine Worm locations. Our page has all of their locations for you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Loong_Balm.md', within the main section titled 'Loong Balm'.
The content is as follows:
As with all Drinks, the potency of the Loong Balm can be increased by finding the Awoken Wine Worm locations. Our page has all of their locations for you.
